item.title: Unrepentant Dem Rep. Al Green Faces Censure for Obstructing Official Proceeding
item.description: The House is expected to vote on censuring an unrepentant Rep. Al Green, D-Texas, on Thursday for his outburst during President Donald Trump's address...

item.title: Trump Admin Continues to Cut Federal Workforce
item.description: The Trump administration's efforts to reduce the federal workforce continues.

item.title: Voice of America Moving Swiftly to Assert Trump's Vision
item.description: As it has with other government agencies, the Trump administration is moving swiftly to assert its vision at the Voice of America.
